resources.string:
Want to save time on adding transactions? You can now automatically add them by uploading an XLS file!

 Itâ€™s simple:
 1. Prepare Your File: Make sure your XLS file follows our predefined format.
 2. Upload Your File: Click the Upload button and select your file.
 3. Watch the Magic: Our system will instantly add all the transactions for you!

No more manual entries, just quick and easy uploads. Try it now and streamline your transaction management!

To ensure your transactions are added automatically, your XLS file must follow our exact format.

 If the file doesnt match the required format, it wont be accepted, and the transactions wont be added.

 Check out the image below to see the correct format.
